description.en:
Starting from the case of sitting close together in class, familiarity began to occur between Judith Olivia and Biyan Angga, initially Judith did not really know Biyan, what Judith knew was that Biyan was an annoying person. But the funny thing is that time actually brings Judith and Biyan closer, especially because Judith and Biyan have a lot in common, similarities in the movies they watch, the taste of music they listen to and much more. More and more, Judith secretly paid attention to Biyan, she thought that whatever Biyan did was cool, even bad things like skipping classes.

They also became good partners in tests, cheating on each other and helping each other when one of them had given up. Their relationship without realizing it was not just a friendly relationship anymore, Judith and Biyan were even in a temporary boyfriend/girlfriend relationship?

Initially Judith and Biyan agreed that their relationship was only based on wanting to make Biyan's ex, Angie, jealous. However, over time, they forgot about the purpose of making jealous, the various sweet things they did together actually happened not just scenarios. Until one day, Angie, Biyan's ex came back, Biyan decided on a choice that was considered the best for his relationship with Judith. In the end, no matter what, Judith is still a temporary girlfriend.
Is there a rift between Judith and Biyan's relationship? Where does their story end up?

(Source: Bentang Komik Facebook, translated)
description.id:
Dimulai dari perkara duduk berdekatan di kelas, keakraban mulai terjadi antara Judith Olivia dan Biyan Angga, awalnya Judith tidak terlalu mengenal Biyan, yang Judith ketahui bahwa Biyan adalah orang yang menyebalkan. Tapi lucunya waktu justru mendekatkan Judith dan Biyan, terutama karena Judith dan Biyan memiliki banyak kesamaan, kesamaan dalam film yang mereka tonton, selera music yang mereka dengarkan dan masih banyak lagi. Makin kesini, Judith diam-diam memperhatikan Biyan, ia menganggap perbuatan apapun yang dilakukan Biyan itu keren, sekalipun perbuatan buruk seperti bolos kelas.

Mereka pun menjadi rekan baik dalam ulangan, saling contek-menyontek dan membantu ketika diantara mereka sudah jatuh pasrah. Hubungan mereka tanpa disadari bukan sekedar hubungan persahabatan lagi, Judith dan Biyan malah menjalin hubungan pacar sementara ?

Awalnya Judith dan Biyan setuju bahwa Hubungan mereka memang hanya berlandaskan ingin membuat cemburu mantannya Biyan, Angie. Namun, berjalannya waktu, mereka pun melupakan tentang tujuan membuat cemburu tersebut, berbagai hal manis yang mereka lakukan berdua nyata terjadi bukan hanya scenario saja. Sampai suatu ketika, Angie, mantan Biyan kembali datang, Biyan pun memutuskan sebuah pilihan yang dianggap terbaik untuk hubungannya dengan Judith. Pada akhirnya, mau bagaimana pun Judit tetaplah seorang pacar sementara.
Apakah ada keretakan antara hubungan Judith dan Biyan? Ke mana akhirnya kisah mereka bermuara?

(Sumber: Laman Facebook Bentang Komik)
